choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today presuming no dietary restrictions.
Sure, here is one example of what I think would be an ideal menu.  It includes protein sources from chicken and salmon along with vegetables like broccoli and sweet potatoes as well as some whole grains in the form of quinoa.   I also included a healthy serving of avocado for fat which has many health benefits including supporting heart health, lowering cholesterol levels,and promoting weight loss.
